response.overview: Without cash or time, traveling to Greece may not be the easiest vacation to organize, but this documentary offers the next best thing -- a virtual vacation right into the heart of the Greek Isles. Cruise the Mediterranean waters and discover a vibrant world filled with history and grandeur. There'll be no seasickness here, as mesmerizing images of a land that balances the ancient and the modern flit onscreen for a trip to remember.
response.title: Cruise Greece
